cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.5)

project(libLLVM10_swiftshader_debug)

# Check if the major CMakeLists.txt file has correctly set
# the ANDROID_ROOT directory.
if (IS_DIRECTORY ${ANDROID_ROOT})
    message(STATUS "${PROJECT_NAME}, has been set android root")
else ()
    if (IS_DIRECTORY ${BUILD_NATIVE_ROOT})
        message(WARNING "${PROJECT_NAME}, set ANDROID_ROOT via BUILD_NATIVE_ROOT=${BUILD_NATIVE_ROOT}")
        set(ANDROID_ROOT ${BUILD_NATIVE_ROOT})
        set(OUT_INTERMEDIATES_ROOT ${ANDROID_ROOT}/out/soong/.intermediates)
    else ()
        message(FATAL_ERROR "${PROJECT_NAME}, ANDROID_ROOT was NULL")
    endif ()
endif ()

#################### libLLVM10_swiftshader_debug ####################

        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/Thumb1FrameLowering.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/Thumb1InstrInfo.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/Thumb2InstrInfo.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/Thumb2ITBlockPass.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/Thumb2SizeReduction.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/ThumbRegisterInfo.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/Utils/ARMBaseInfo.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/MC/MCAsmMacro.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Support/Locale.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Support/circular_raw_ostream.cpp
)
set(SOURCE_FILES "")
foreach (file ${FILES})
    if (EXISTS ${file})
        list(APPEND SOURCE_FILES ${file})
    endif ()
endforeach ()

if (NOT SOURCE_FILES)
    message(WARNING "${PROJECT_NAME}, source files not exist")
else ()
    add_library(libLLVM10_swiftshader_debug SHARED ${SOURCE_FILES})

    target_include_directories(libLLVM10_swiftshader_debug
            PUBLIC
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/include
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/configs/common/include
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/configs/android/include
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/X86
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/AArch64
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/configs/common/lib/IR
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/configs/common/lib/Target/AArch64
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/configs/common/lib/Target/ARM
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/configs/common/lib/Target/X86
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/configs/common/lib/Transforms/InstCombine
    )

    # Add c/c++ flags
    target_compile_options(libLLVM10_swiftshader_debug PRIVATE
            -Werror
            -Wno-unused-parameter
            -Wno-unused-variable
            -UNDEBUG
    )

    target_link_libraries(libLLVM10_swiftshader_debug
            libc++_static
            libc++_static
            libc++demangle
            libc
            libclang_rt.builtins
            libclang_rt.builtins
            libdl
            libm
            libc
            libdl
            libm
    )
endif ()
#################### libLLVM10_swiftshader_debug ####################

#################### libLLVM10_swiftshader ####################

        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/Disassembler/ARMDisassembler.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/MCTargetDesc/ARMAsmBackend.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/MCTargetDesc/ARMELFObjectWriter.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/MCTargetDesc/ARMELFStreamer.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/MCTargetDesc/ARMInstPrinter.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/MCTargetDesc/ARMMachObjectWriter.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/MCTargetDesc/ARMMachORelocationInfo.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/MCTargetDesc/ARMMCAsmInfo.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/MCTargetDesc/ARMMCCodeEmitter.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/MCTargetDesc/ARMMCExpr.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/MCTargetDesc/ARMMCTargetDesc.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/MCTargetDesc/ARMTargetStreamer.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/MCTargetDesc/ARMUnwindOpAsm.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/MCTargetDesc/ARMWinCOFFObjectWriter.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/MCTargetDesc/ARMWinCOFFStreamer.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/MLxExpansionPass.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/MVEGatherScatterLowering.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/MVETailPredication.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/MVEVPTBlockPass.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/TargetInfo/ARMTargetInfo.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/Thumb1FrameLowering.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/Thumb1InstrInfo.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/Thumb2InstrInfo.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/Thumb2ITBlockPass.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/Thumb2SizeReduction.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/ThumbRegisterInfo.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/Utils/ARMBaseInfo.cpp
)
set(SOURCE_FILES "")
foreach (file ${FILES})
    if (EXISTS ${file})
        list(APPEND SOURCE_FILES ${file})
    endif ()
endforeach ()

if (NOT SOURCE_FILES)
    message(WARNING "${PROJECT_NAME}, source files not exist")
else ()
    add_library(libLLVM10_swiftshader SHARED ${SOURCE_FILES})

    target_include_directories(libLLVM10_swiftshader
            PUBLIC
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/include
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/configs/common/include
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/configs/android/include
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/X86
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/AArch64
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/llvm/lib/Target/ARM
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/configs/common/lib/IR
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/configs/common/lib/Target/AArch64
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/configs/common/lib/Target/ARM
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/configs/common/lib/Target/X86
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/swiftshader/third_party/llvm-10.0/configs/common/lib/Transforms/InstCombine
    )

    # Add c/c++ flags
    target_compile_options(libLLVM10_swiftshader PRIVATE
            -Werror
            -Wno-unused-parameter
            -Wno-unused-variable
    )

    target_link_libraries(libLLVM10_swiftshader
            libc++_static
            libc++_static
            libc++demangle
            libc
            libclang_rt.builtins
            libclang_rt.builtins
            libdl
            libm
            libc
            libdl
            libm
    )
endif ()
#################### libLLVM10_swiftshader ####################
